Package de.esoco.storage

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AfterStoreHandler
    An interface that can be implemented by objects that perform some operations after they have been stored by a Storage implementation.
    Query<T>
    A query object that represents a query of storage objects.
    QueryList.ElementInitializer<T>
    A simple interface that provides a method to initialize the list elements after they have been queried.
    QueryResult<T>
    An interface that defines the methods for the iteration over the result of a storage query.
    StorageManager.MappingFactory<T>
    The interface for classes that create storage mappings.
    StorageMapping<T,A extends org.obrel.core.Relatable,C extends StorageMapping<?,A,?>>
    Interface that defines the methods for a specific mapping from an object type to it's storage representation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    QueryList<T>
    A List implementation that receives it's content from a storage query.
    QueryPredicate<T>
    A predicate that encapsulates the data that is necessary to perform a query on objects in a storage.
    Storage
    This is the base class for all storage implementations.
    StorageDefinition
    An abstract base class that defines a storage that can be created by the class StorageManager.
    StorageManager
    A static factory class that provides methods to create, access, and manage storage instances.
    StoragePredicates
    Contains static factory methods that generate predicates which are specific for storage queries.
    StoragePredicates.GetAttribute<I,A extends org.obrel.core.Relatable>
    An element accessor that uses reflection to query the value of a certain field in target objects.
    StoragePredicates.Like
    A comparison that is equivalent to the SQL LIKE expression which compares string input values to a SQL-specific string pattern.
    StoragePredicates.SortPredicate<T>
    An element predicate that is used to define the ordering of storage queries.
    StorageRelationTypes
    This class contains relation types for storage implementations.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    StorageException
    A runtime exception that is thrown by errors in Storage implementations.
    StorageRuntimeException
    A runtime exception that can be used if checked exceptions are not supported to wrap instances of StorageException.
